00026 /// A base test fixture that includes a State object with a
00027 /// builtin "cat" rule.
00028 struct StateTestWithBuiltinRules : public testing::Test {
00029   StateTestWithBuiltinRules();
00030   Node* GetNode(const string& path);
00031 
00032   State state_;
00033 };
00034 
00035 void AssertParse(State* state, const char* input);

00037 /// An implementation of DiskInterface that uses an in-memory representation
00038 /// of disk state.  It also logs file accesses and directory creations
00039 /// so it can be used by tests to verify disk access patterns.
00040 struct VirtualFileSystem : public DiskInterface {
00041   /// "Create" a file with a given mtime and contents.
00042   void Create(const string& path, int time, const string& contents);
00043 
00044   // DiskInterface
00045   virtual int Stat(const string& path);
00046   virtual bool MakeDir(const string& path);
00047   virtual string ReadFile(const string& path, string* err);
00048   virtual int RemoveFile(const string& path);
00049 
00050   /// An entry for a single in-memory file.
00051   struct Entry {
00052     int mtime;
00053     string contents;
00054   };
00055 
00056   vector<string> directories_made_;
00057   vector<string> files_read_;
00058   typedef map<string, Entry> FileMap;
00059   FileMap files_;
00060   set<string> files_removed_;
00061 };
00062 
00063 #endif // NINJA_TEST_H_
